content:encoded:
Case Closed begins with Night Beat this week. We’ll hear The Night Watchman, their broadcast from May 15, 1950.

(25:17) Broadway Is My Beat closes out the show with The Ricardo Miguel Murder Case, first heard October 27, 1951.

Download CaseClosed762

Case Closed is made possible by you! If you’re able to help out, visit donate.relicradio.com for more information. And, if you’d like some stories featuring Vincent Price for Halloween, you will get (via download) a small collection of stories featuring him with your $10 donation.

A $20 donation gets you Vincent and a collection of spooky stories written by Lucille Fletcher, who you know from Sorry, Wrong Number, and The Hitch-hiker. Find her, and other sets at donate.relicradio.com.

As always, my thanks to those who’ve contributed over the years!
